description:
Yoshino and Kirishima have returned to Tokyo and should conclude their discussion that began in Osaka. However, Yoshino behaves as if Kirishima does not exist.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Kanojo ga Kageru to Yamiyo ga Orite Ame ga Furu
Quand elle est fâchée, la nuit s`assombrit
When She`s Upset the Rain Falls and the Dark Night Descends
彼女が翳ると闇夜が降りて雨がふる
